Card.Name: Argothian Enchantress
Card.RulesText: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.

Card.Name: Thunderscape Familiar
Card.RulesText: First strike Black spells and green spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

Card.Name: Bloodbraid Elf
Card.RulesText: Haste Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

Card.Name: Ground Seal
Card.RulesText: When Ground Seal enters the battlefield, draw a card. Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.

Card.Name: Exploration
Card.RulesText: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

Card.Name: Life From the Loam
Card.RulesText: Return up to three target land cards from your graveyard to your hand. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

Card.Name: Phyrexian Altar
Card.RulesText: Sacrifice a creature: Add one mana of any color.

Card.Name: Words of War
Card.RulesText: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, Words of War deals 2 damage to any target instead.

Card.Name: Goblin Bombardment
Card.RulesText: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Saproling Burst
Card.RulesText: Fading 7 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with seven fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Remove a fade counter from Saproling Burst: Create a green Saproling creature token. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on Saproling Burst." When Saproling Burst leaves the battlefield, destroy all tokens created with Saproling Burst. They can't be regenerated.

Card.Name: Fecundity
Card.RulesText: Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller may draw a card.

Card.Name: Enchantress's Presence
Card.RulesText: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.

Card.Name: Seismic Assault
Card.RulesText: Discard a land card: Seismic Assault deals 2 damage to any target.
